name: Color Swap Platformer Prototype
description:
A quick and dirty platformer prototype created for the 6-hour long Game Jam Extravaganza held by IGDA Sacramento. Swap between different colors in order to hop on platforms of that specific color. Be careful, though, because the platforms switch colors too! Get the star on the highest platform to finish the game.

Mac only due to limitations with cross-platform packaging from Unreal Engine.
